mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, (SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM article a WHERE a.category_id = c.id AND a.is_private = 0) AS articleCount FROM category c ORDER BY c.id
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.create_time AS createTime, c.update_time AS updateTime, (SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM article a WHERE a.category_id = c.id) AS articleCount FROM category c ORDER BY c.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM article WHERE category_id = #{id} LIMIT 1
